alertAcknowledged: Another Responder has acknowledged this request. (You don't need to respond to this message.)
alertCompleted: Thank you! This session is now complete. (You don't need to respond to this message.)
alertFallback: There has been an unresponded request at {{ clientDisplayName }} {{ buttonDisplayName }}
alertReminder: Please Respond "Ok" if you have followed up on your call. If you do not respond within 2 minutes an emergency alert will be issued to staff.
alertStart: There has been a request for help from {{ buttonDisplayName }} . Please respond "Ok" when you have followed up on the call.
alertUrgent: This in an urgent request. The button has been pressed {{ numberOfAlerts }} times. Please respond "Ok" when you have followed up on the call.
buttonLowBatteryInitial:
The battery for the {{ buttonDisplayName }} Button is low, and needs recharging.

To watch a video showing how to recharge the battery, go to https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=h7_5ff-_r5A
buttonLowBatteryReminder:
The battery for the {{ buttonDisplayName }} Button is still low, and needs recharging.

To watch a video showing how to recharge the battery, go to https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=h7_5ff-_r5A
buttonLowBatteryNoLonger: The battery for the {{ buttonDisplayName }} Button is no longer low. Thank you.
buttonStatusChangeDisconnected: There were connection changes for the buttons at {{ clientDisplayName }}. The following buttons have disconnected: {{ disconnectedButtons }}.
buttonStatusChangeReconnected: There were connection changes for the buttons at {{ clientDisplayName }}. The following buttons have reconnected: {{ reconnectedButtons }}.
buttonStatusChangeDisconnectedAndReconne: There were connection changes for the buttons at {{ clientDisplayName }}. The following buttons have disconnected: {{ disconnectedButtons }}. The following buttons have reconnected: {{ reconnectedButtons }}.
gatewayDisconnectionInitial:
The connection for {{ gatewayDisplayName }} Button Hub has been lost. 
Please unplug the hub and plug it back in to reset it. If you do not receive a reconnection message shortly after doing this, please email clientsupport@brave.coop.
gatewayDisconnectionReminder:
{{ gatewayDisplayName }} Button Hub is still disconnected. 
Please unplug the hub and plug it back in to reset it. If you do not receive a reconnection message shortly after doing this, please email clientsupport@brave.coop.
incidentCategorized:
The incident was categorized as {{ incidentCategory }}.

Thank you. This session is now complete. (You don't need to respond to this message.)
incidentCategoryInvalid: Sorry, the incident type wasn't recognized. Please try again.
incidentCategoryRequest:
Once you have responded, please reply with the number that best describes the incident:
{{ incidentCategories }}
